review: I don't like paying for free apps

review: There is a lot of buffering and it cuts off in the middle of the movies. The idea of it was nice but it doesn't work as well as I thought it would.

review: Work as good as tv lacking some apps

review: I had difficulaty setting it up, but it works after set up.

review: I would recommend Amazon fire stick to anyone. Especially someone who already is an Amazon Prime customer. It works very well.

review: This is not worth 1 cent. It disconnected and streams all through movies.  I have full great connection and it still does not work I am sending them both back got one for gift I am embarrassed I gave it now. They have same problem.  Only 1 star cause I had to to submit this
author: Joni

review: Happy with the product, but not happy that I had to input my credit card info just to get the FREE Netflix app!

review: Simple to install and use! Great for the price!!
